values.Settings.AutomaticNegotiation.Title: Negotiation helper
values.Settings.ChangeLanguage.Desc: Which language, instead of the recognized one, should be used?
values.Settings.ChangeLanguage.Title: Change language
values.Settings.CustomerApi.Desc:
Would you like to send some data to your own server?
After this activation the game will reload and a new menu item appears.
values.Settings.CustomerApi.Title: Players API
values.Settings.GlobalSend.Desc:
If you want to track data with your guild, activate this point.
For a self-sufficient extension simply disable.
values.Settings.GlobalSend.Title: Transmission to foe-rechner.de
values.Settings.MenuLength.Desc:
How many elements high should the menu be?
Empty or "0" means automatic height.
values.Settings.MenuLength.Title: Menu length
values.Settings.PreScanLGList.Desc:
Scans the overview list of the neighbor when opening and determines possibly fillable great buildings.
Note: Since the final seats are only transmitted when opening a great building, the result may differ. The scan is saved, however.
values.Settings.PreScanLGList.Title: Preliminary scan of the great building overview
values.Settings.ResetBoxPositions.Desc: Should all box coordinates be reset?
values.Settings.ResetBoxPositions.Title: Box coordinates

values.Settings.SendGEXInfo.Title: GEX evaluations
